text:
Entium | Senior Software Developer (.NET) | Jersey City, NJ | Full-time, Onsite http://entium.com/careers/senior-software-developer-net

Entium is a IT integrator using the .NET stack, a consultancy with offices in Pennsylvania and New Jersey. We operate within the engineering, infrastructure, and manufacturing industries.

Interview process: Phone screen followed by one or two on-site interview near Exchange Place, Jersey City, NJ.

Full job description and contact information here: http://entium.com/careers/senior-software-developer-net
